entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 then to 60 gusting to 90 early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
